definition: dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: West Lake Water Shield Soup is also called "Chicken, Ham and Water Shield Soup", and it is the traditional Hangzhou famous Food.
sentences.chinese: 西湖莼菜汤又称鸡火莼菜汤，是杭州的传统名菜。

definition: Manchurian wild rice 菰[gu1], aka water bamboo, or its edible stem, which resembles a bamboo shoot
edible rhizome of cattail 香蒲[xiang1 pu2]
Gorgon fruit/Semen euryales (botany)/see also 芡實|芡实[qian4 shi2]
winter bamboo shoots (smaller and tenderer as a result of being dug out before they come out of the soil)
citron daylily (Hemerocallis citrina Baroni)/golden needles (edible flower)
oriental whitebait/slender silvery-white fish e.g. Galaxias maculatus and Salangichthys microdon
